name: Copy File To
description: Tool to copy a file from a source path to a target directory, preserving the filename and extension.
author: @@official.shinkai

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite the file if it already exists in the target directory

target_directory_path.description: The target directory path where the file should be copied

source_file_path.description: The path of the source file to copy

error_message.description: Error message if any error occurred

new_directory_created.description: The path of the newly created directory if a new directory was created

saved_file_path.description: The path where the file was saved
